Nerangs.ab: va yek aṣ̌əm vōhū goftan aɱāi raēsca tā sar va yek aṣ̌əm vōhū goftan hazaŋhrəm se bār tā sar va yek aṣ̌em vohu goftan va jasa.mē auuaŋhe mazda se bār tā sar va yek aṣ̌em vohu goftan

"He should recite one Aṣ̌əm Vohū, (then) aɱāi raēsca until the end and one Aṣ̌əm Vohū, (followed by) three times hazaŋhrəm until the end. He should recite one Aṣ̌əm Vohū and three times jasa.mē auuaŋhe mazda until the end. He should recite one Aṣ̌əm Vohū."
